tasks.task: Plant peanuts in April and May.
subtasks: Plant peanut seeds at the appropriate depth.
Space the rows and plants as recommended for peanut cultivation.

tasks.task: Monitor the growth of peanuts until harvest.
subtasks: Check for the flower bloom above the ground.
Observe the development of the peanut fruit below the ground.
Monitor the growth cycle of the peanut plant.

tasks.task: Prepare for harvest when peanuts have matured.
subtasks: Determine the appropriate time to harvest based on growth cycle.
Collect the peanuts from the ground where the fruit develops.
